DOC.brief_summary: Study assess effect Fluticasone Propionate acute lung inflammation follow inhaled lipopolysaccharide ( LPS ) challenge . Study conduct healthy volunteer . Assessment inflammation via sputum induction .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Determine Effects Of Fluticasone Propionate On Sputum Neutrophils After Inhaled Lipopolysaccharide Challenge In Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Normoresponsive airway histamine PC20 > 16mg/mL Able complete sputum induction successfully Non ( ex ) smokers No LPS challenge previous 4 week
